E: Elliptic Curve defined by y^2 = x^3 + 1  (mod 850211368042864797821781809961773)

Let points on E be:
P = (299462476376354557436726357480295 : 691511297017934243004892573497455 : 1)
Q = (575757913339371006661951906238476 : 811726331804692211570061583143873 : 1)

such that:
Q = d*P

iv = 86a0bee1de71e91071429361068a50b7
key = sha1(d)
cipher = AES_CBC(key, iv)
enc_flag = cipher.encrypt(flag) = ee8611990896dded3909773661ec8c44d762141787ff6a853b3bc2663a8ff5d35d80240292178d6f09295bfdda1be3d8
